description: Fun and addictive 2048 Puzzle game for Mobile devices.-HOW TO PLAY- Swipe to movie tiles when two tiles with the same number touch they merge in to one value(2 + 2 = 4) and when 2048 reach the tile ,the player wins! 2,4,8....64....512...2048.[GAME FEATURES AND ADVANTAGES ]  +No Ads  +No Permission  +Super 2048 Single Player Mode  +Single UNDO Mode  +Beautiful Animations  +Simple and Beautiful UI  +Easy Share Score with friends  +Keep Playing for high score after collected 2048 tile  +Endless Mode  +Optimize for mobile devicesEnjoy the game...Note: Originally Developed by Port of Gabriele Cirulli's 2048.
descriptionHTML:
Fun and addictive 2048 Puzzle game for Mobile devices.

-HOW TO PLAY-
Swipe to movie tiles when two tiles with the same number touch they merge in to one value(2 + 2 = 4) and when 2048 reach the tile ,the player wins! 2,4,8....64....512...2048.

[GAME FEATURES AND ADVANTAGES ]

+No Ads
+No Permission
+Super 2048 Single Player Mode
+Single UNDO Mode
+Beautiful Animations
+Simple and Beautiful UI
+Easy Share Score with friends
+Keep Playing for high score after collected 2048 tile
+Endless Mode
+Optimize for mobile devices

Enjoy the game...

Note: Originally Developed by Port of Gabriele Cirulli's 2048.
comments: The title should be different. No version of 2048 is endless. Otherwise its a great app.
Simple, addictive, untimed & easily put down to tend to real/non-virtual matters. And NO permissions!
Cool Amazing really i love this app
